name: Unusual Space
description:
Made for Mashup Game Jam  2. The theme was Unconventional Means. I chose to make a game around this by having a space shooter where your bullets fire in a random angle, but screen wrap. Soon the game becomes a chaotic mess where you're trying to kill all the aliens while still keeping track of where you are and not getting hit! Move the ship with mouse and left click to fire. Music made in BeepBox, art in Piskel, game in GDevelop 5.

also first lol
